name: Step 2: General non-fiction chapter outline.
description: Creates a nonfiction chapter outline for a book.
prompt:
Take this chapter heading from a non-fiction book and develop an outline with 10 ideas that this chapter should cover.
Topic: [topic]
Taking the above into account, write 5 to 10 bullets for the [insert chapter here]
Bullets:
